name: Prawn & Basil Ravioli in a Tomato Sauce
recipeInstructions: 1. Put the tomatoes in a roasting tin. Drizzle with olive oil, and roast for 40 minutes at gas 1/140C.
3. Push the tomatoes through a sieve into a pan, squeeze in the garlic, discarding the skin. Add the watercress.
4. Mix the prawns, basil leaves, breadcrumbs, egg, and lemon zest and fill the ravioli.
6. Warm through the sauce, adding a little cream at the end.
